summary: Drifting floozy Billie Nash gets a bar job where she seduces the owner's husband by convincing him to defraud his drunkard wife in order to elope together to Mexico but a sleazy neighbor with designs on Billie jeopardizes her plans.
cast: Beverly Michaels|Richard Egan|Percy Helton|Evelyn Scott|Robert Osterloh|William 'Bill' Phillips|Frank Ferguson|Bernadene Hayes|John Alvin|Gordon Armitage|Helen Brown|George Bruggeman|Sidney Clute|Tristram Coffin|Bing Conley|Michael Jeffers|Kenner G. Kemp|Ralph Montgomery|William Newell|James Parnell|Richard Reeves|Ralph Sanford|Frank J. Scannell|Jack Shea|Carl Sklover|Mabel Smaney|Robert B. Williams
title: Wicked Woman
